website_summaries.verdict: Extremely popular watch offered at a super low price. Unique design of the band makes this watch attention-grabbing.
pros: Owners appreciate the stylish rose gold color
Makes a great gift because of its reasonable price and sharp design
Customers report the watch keeps time accurately
cons: Some people don't like the unique design of the band
Watch may have some longevity issues

customer_reviews.title: Great watch !!
customer_reviews.text: There is no dislike for this watch, it's all likes for this wonderful looking watch. It looks so much like it's a high in watch. It makes me want to wear it 24/7 but i can't. ( I have to shower and sleep )
customer_reviews.author: J BABY

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Exactly as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: No surprises here! Watch is exactly as pictured. I'm giving it to a teacher at my girls' daycare for mother's day. I think she'll love it. I do! I tried it on and it's a perfect fit; no gaps or spaces, and I have average sized wrists ( whatever that means). Would be FLAWLESS if the band was adjustable, but for the price, I can't complain, so I won't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just as advertised and looks great! For the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stylish watch for my wife, and she loves it! The product is exactly as described in the description. It fits very well, just as advertised and looks great! For the price, it is a very good deal. The clasp to latch/unlatch is a little bit tight, but I expect that will get easier with time. It came very quickly, and arrived in a nice box. Overall, I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dmoody

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, pretty watch
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and classy looking, you wouldn't guess how inexpensive it was. My 30 something daughter loves rose gold and fell in love with it when she unwrapped it!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch
customer_reviews.text: I receive this lovely watch. It was boxed so lovely. I love the big face of the watch. It looks a lot prettier than the pictures. You will not be disappointed in this watch. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eva J. Dunkle

customer_reviews.title: Bought this watch because it was stylish and a beautiful rose gold color
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch because it was stylish and a beautiful rose gold color. Tried it on, and it looked great!
customer_reviews.author: TroyStreetAl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Large Face, Easy to Read
customer_reviews.text: First time wearing this watch and already received 3 compliments. It is pretty but I like the fact that it has a large face that is easy to read even in low light.
customer_reviews.author: Orange13

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beAutiful and an elegant stylish rose gold watch which I bought as a gift for my cousin. I was so much tempted to keep it for myself but I ended up deciding buy one more of the same for myself. The rose gold tone of this watch is very pleasant unlike many other watches on the market. Thanks etevon!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I get lots of compliments and of course the price is fantastic. I will be ordering more for holiday gifts
customer_reviews.text: This is a very stylish unusual rose gold watch. It is so different from the regular water resistant ones I have had. I get lots of compliments and of course the price is fantastic. I will be ordering more for holiday gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: An elegant wrist watch to gift to someone who matters to you.
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing to complain about. Best value for money. It looks so stylish. The design is unique. Looks much better real than in pictures. I am sure this would never get unnoticed in anyone's wrist. It is best suited for people with a slightly bigger and rounded wrist. I have gifted this to my friend who means so much to me and I am not unhappy for my selection at all. I got another watch of the same price range from a well known company, which has a style which is probably going on for 30 years :( I would definitely buy some more whenever I need to get gifts for my other friends.
customer_reviews.author: Always truthfully

customer_reviews.title: She is in love with it.
customer_reviews.text: This piece of jewelry tainted wrist watch is a piece of art so good that my girl is totally happy for my choice. It came ina beautiful casing and delivery service was unique
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Mwachande

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch!! It looks and feels light, airy, and classy. Fits my small wrist perfectly, but no way to make larger.
customer_reviews.author: JeanRM

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Elegant
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited that this is packaged so well and looks beautiful because it is going to be such a wonderful gift for a coworker. I can't wait until she sees it! The color is just as it looks - rose gold is fantastic. It is also safely packaged so that it can simply be wrapped or placed in a gift bag to present to someone else. Classy and elegant - what I was going for!
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Attractive watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch arrived without any imperfections. It was very attractive on the wrist and looks great when you want to dress up an outfit. The rose gold looks expensive but the price was very reasonable. I would definitely purchase this for someone as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: T.Waskie

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Elegant and light. Goes really well with most of my wardrobe! I would order through ETEVON again. It did fit me a little loose, but that's how I want my dress watch to be worn. A little on the loose side. It still deserves 5 stars because of its sophisticated style.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonU

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic watching
customer_reviews.text: Lovely watch! It is nice design and fashionable color. As soon as I got this watch i tried it immediately. It is so amazing. Love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: xue jiang

customer_reviews.title: This is a very pretty watch. The wrist band is a bit large ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty watch. The wrist band is a bit large for me, I would like it a bit more flush against the smallest part of my wrist. My wrist is about 6.5 inches and the watch is about 7 inches. I cannont figure a way to adjust it. Otherwise I do like it. Simple yet elegant.
customer_reviews.author: SSWise

customer_reviews.title: I do not like tight watches
customer_reviews.text: Too small, and I do not have large wrists. I have a 7" wrist and this would close but not move on my wrist as a bangle type band. I do not like tight watches. Very pretty though.
customer_reviews.author: c.b.

customer_reviews.title: watch LOSES TIME
customer_reviews.text: The watch arrived beautifully packaged and I was very surprised at how beautiful it is however I only gave the product 4 stars as my wrist is very small and I do not do the band justice I had to remove a link for it to fit properly..... EDIT AND UPDATE Sorry I had to edit this review as the watch started losing time about 2 weeks later and the long hand was skipping and rotating on its own . So now I an stuck with a watch that acts as a " bracelet" and not fulfilling its basic function - telling the correct time :(
customer_reviews.author: D. B.

customer_reviews.title: Look Elsewhere!
customer_reviews.text: 10 Days and it started losing time. Non adjustable band and way too big for an average size wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Sherritini

customer_reviews.title: The clasp doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch and am trying to figure out how I can wear it. The clasp is either incomplete or defective in some other way. So what do I do? I could tie it together with some kind of gold ribbon or take it to the jeweler who won't want to bother with it since they didn't sell it to me. Any suggestions? I did read another complaint about the closure but figured I would take a chance. I'm glad I didn't spend a bundle on it
customer_reviews.author: echo grandma

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and inexpensive - my wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. This is the second one I've bought her, and the only reason she needed a new one was because the battery died after nearly two years, and we decided it was cheaper to buy a new watch than replace the battery. Sweating did cause the band to fade, so it's probably best not to wear it during activities that generate a lot of sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Skipped time
customer_reviews.text: It is very pretty if somewhat large for a woman. The problem is that it started skipping hours at a time. It would be running when I looked at it but hours were missing. I finally threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rosett

customer_reviews.title: Classy and stylish looking
customer_reviews.text: This rose-gold watch is very feminine and stylish!!! I love wearing it and the clasp isn’t too tight. Great for dress-up kind of purifies/outing and it looks really classy for the price. The watch came in a regular box that’s really well packaged - this would make for a great gift as well!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria H. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great watch but BAND IS SMALL!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but beware: the band is really small!! It could hardly go around my mom's hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Webb

customer_reviews.title: Nice and  very light
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice item...I received a lot of compliments when I wear it
customer_reviews.author: mirelan.braga

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant looking watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful. I am very satisfied with this purchase. The watch arrived by the promised date and looks even better than the picture. Got a number of compliments. I will be making future purchases from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Vabe

customer_reviews.title: Rose gold match.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Purchased to match rose gold earrings and anklet in a wedding. The rose gold coloring matches them perfectly. A bit on the small side but it fits. I have a larger wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K Waugh

customer_reviews.title: Rose Gold Wrist Watch
customer_reviews.text: Liked the difference. It is a little big but I did get a lot of compliments. It will be a wear sometimes watch.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: cannot adjust band
customer_reviews.text: bought for elder mom small wrist said can remove link with tool not true so I returned. The clasp was great for her but not having the ability to remove links not good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: R Fisher
customer_reviews.text: Nice, it like it. The only problem is that the bracelet is not adjustable, so if you have a small wrist it may not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: RDFisher.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very chic watch
customer_reviews.text: I liked the watch because it looks rich and beautiful. I especially liked that it is a bracelet watch. Most other watches have bands that I am allergic to.
customer_reviews.author: merrymaid

customer_reviews.title: I fell in love and kept it anyway
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch knowing I needed one for a new job. I order this watch too soon and realized I needed a watch with a timer and other features. I haven't worn a watch in years, but when I received this watch, I fell in love and kept it anyway. It's chic and simple and lovely. I have narrow wrists but this first perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy A.

customer_reviews.title: Late review - Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Loved the watch in the early stages of purchase. Look out for colour fade gradually (which was expected). Mine started giving problems in under 2 years. The money it will cost to fix, I might as well get a new one:(
customer_reviews.author: Jayslims

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: When I received this watch, the clasp was broken. Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: littlelady5

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. I still use it. I thought it would be brittle but it’s lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful, but...
customer_reviews.text: ...the face is so heavy, it swings around to the bottom of my wrist and I can't see what time it is. It's just not very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, but had to return it as it was too small. Contacted the seller to see if they had links, but they don't. Too bad.

customer_reviews.title: battery can't be replaced
customer_reviews.text: Lasted six months - pretty while it lasted - battery can't be replaced - ETEVON unresponsive

customer_reviews.title: Appearance
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Beautiful. Way prettier in person. Received it very fast and have received tons of compliments on it already. Great watch.

customer_reviews.title: Timepiece that classy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: watch is a great piece of jewelry! Looks better on the arm, than in the picture. It is classy and dressy.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive look for good price
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn this twice so far so can't give an idea about how it wears, but it sure looks good now.

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice watch very pretty, but it is too big to fit most arms! It's more like a bracelet than a watch. Make sure to look at the sizing before you buy; something I did not do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this watch but it was a tad too small ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this watch but it was a tad too small for me so I had to send it back. But it is a pretty watch.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 weeks and then stopped. Changed batteries ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 2 weeks and then stopped. Changed batteries still didn’t work. I hope Manufacture will contact me and send me a replacement.

customer_reviews.title: Very good and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful watch.I offer it to my friend and she really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bee’s

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful. I wasn't sure I would like the rose ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today. It's beautiful. I wasn't sure I would like the rose gold. This watch changed my mind!!!!!!! It's light weight and looks great on. I'm now looking for other jewelry to match it.

customer_reviews.title: I advise everyone to NOT BUY THIS BRAND

customer_reviews.title: This watch is Absolutely GORGEOUS!!!.
customer_reviews.text: It fits comfortably on my wrist, and it has a low profile. The bracelet is not clunky. LOVE IT

customer_reviews.title: Pretty watch as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute watch!I love the design and the color. It's a little big for my waist so I will give it to my teacher as a gift. It is a perfect gift for her. I appreciated the quick shipping as well. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product at a great price, really loved it
customer_reviews.text: I got this product a while ago, the features are great..It has everything that I can think of...SIM card slot, Memory Card Slot, Quick Navigation, nice loud sound, good touch feel....Really a great product at great price point. Quick delivery from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: PANKAJ A KULKARNI

customer_reviews.title: A very good watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the watch is very good. I am really pleased with how beautiful the watch looked. The rose gold color is perfect color also. Bought it for my mother and she could not be happier! Five stars all the way.

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Watch!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING watch. Works perfectly and the rose gold color is absolutely beautiful. I might just buy a new one! Haha

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my wrist
customer_reviews.text: Returned due to this being too small for my wrist. Otherwise I would've kept it- it's very pretty.

customer_reviews.title: Great all around watch for all occasions.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, I had a very difficult time with the clasp. I had to use a tiny screwdriver to open. Other than that issue, I’m very happy with my purchase. I have a medium wrist and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Aveni

customer_reviews.title: Bought a men's ETEVON watch and I loved it so much I surprised my girlfriend with one
customer_reviews.text: Bought a men's ETEVON watch and I loved it so much I surprised my girlfriend with one. It's a gorgeous watch, she loves it and wears it almost everyday as do I. High quality look and feel, highly recommend getting one.

customer_reviews.title: Good product!

customer_reviews.text: I need info on how to make the band smaller & there were no instructions. I can't wear it since it is too big.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect watch to gift
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Perfect to gift someone. Elegant and rich look.

customer_reviews.text: Omg! Yes Yes Yes! I’m just loving my watch It’s absolutely BEAUTIFUL! Beauttttifullllll! Well designed!

customer_reviews.text: Dissatisfied the watch is not working now the time has expire to return it.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn the watch for a month and the band broke. Not worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money I threw it in the trash
customer_reviews.text: I only had this watch for 2weeks and the lock broke. Also the lock was made backwards which made it difficult to open and close. Waste of money I threw it in the trash.

customer_reviews.title: All that glitters really is not good
customer_reviews.text: Having returned the 1st watch and getting a replacement, I was still unable to wear the watch. The minute hand in the first was defective and the hook for 2nd watch would not open.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SOOOO PRETTY!!! I get a lot of compliments on this watch. Recommend.

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My new watch arrived promptly and is beautiful! I wore it daily while on vacation and received many compliments. This watch is very comfortable to wear and fits my wrist so well. This watch is a delight to own.

customer_reviews.title: Opening the clasp may be difficult at first try.
customer_reviews.text: All around beautiful looking watch. We had difficulty opening the clasp.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This watch is so beautiful and believe me when I say it fits perfectly fine. I lovery it.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is great! Got it for my wife as an extra gift for mother’s day and she absolute loved it. The rose gold color is perfect. Just one chain link too big for my wife’s wrist, but that is a simple fix! Exactly what I needed as a gift for the wife!

customer_reviews.title: U can't believe this unique,  beautiful watch was less $20

Arrived on time in a really nice gift box. I'll be ordering another silver bangle-style watch fruition this seller. Very Happy.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Nice wrist band and elegant color
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my wife to gift her and she was thrilled and happy with the grace of the watch. Good value for money. Water proof feature is an extra add-on. I wish the packing could become more stylish though.

I plan to wear it over sweaters so it will fit better on my wrist and be seen :)

product_meta.title: ETEVON Women’s Quartz Rose Gold Wrist Watch with Simple Dial Style and Round Hollow Bracelet Water Resistant, Fashion Luxury Dress Watches for Women
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :9.45 x 2.2 x 1.4 inches; 4.16 Ounces
 * Item model number :0747100093579
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :April 16, 2017
 * Manufacturer :ETEVON
 * ASIN :B06ZY54528

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};
 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #675,969 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #303071 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #3459 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.1 out of 5 stars413 ratings
feature_bullets: ❤UNIQUE ELEGANT DESIGN❤ The watch features with rose gold-toned watch case with simple display design and unique round-hollowed bracelet. Perfect for all kind of business, casual, indoor activities and daily use
❤IDEAL GIFTS FOR WOMEN❤ Comes in an elaborate luxury gift box. No extra wrapping needed. Perfect fashion gift to your girlfriend and wife, etc.
❤WATER RESISTANT FOR DAILY USE❤ Hand washing, splashing and raining are all no problem. NOTE: Please DO NOT IMMERSE IN WATER CHRONICALLY
❤HIGH QUALITY COMPONENTS❤ Imported Japanese quartz movement provides precise and accurate time keeping. Japanese long-usage battery, scratch-resistant mineral glass, stainless steel back case etc.
❤ETEVON SERVICES❤ 90 days money back guarantee for any reasons + 12 months replacement or full refund for quality issues + 24 months maintenance for quality issues
